meta.title: B&B Vita Nova - The public area
meta.description: In the public area of B&B Vita Nova there is room for relaxation. A delicious breakfast with local products is served on board.

hold.heading: The public area
hold.body1: In the public area there is room for relaxation and fun. Would you like a cup of coffee, tea or maybe a special beer? This is all available in our honesty bar.
hold.body2: With a wide range of games and magazines, there is plenty of entertainment. In the winter, the pellet stove provides a wonderful warmth and in the summer you can relax outside on the picnic tables in the sun.

breakfast.heading: Breakfast on board
breakfast.body1: A delicious breakfast is served in the public area from Tuesday to Sunday. We like to work with local suppliers. At breakfast we serve delicious sourdough bread from <1>Elsenburg & Sebastiani</1>, our coffee is from <4>Boot Koffie</4> and the granola is from <8>Bamboo Bytes</8>.
breakfast.body2: Breakfast can be served between 7.30 and 10.30 a.m. on weekdays and from 9.00 to 10.30 a.m. on weekends.
